c:complexType.name: DiscreteCartesianAxis
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The options documentation class of the cartesian axis panel for discrete scale type.
For additional information, please see .

c:property.name: tooltipEnabled
c:property.c:documentation: Indicates if the axis' labels show tooltips.

c:property.name: tooltipFormat
c:property.c:documentation:
A callback function that is called to build the tooltip of an axis' labels.
If the chart's is true, the resulting text must be valid HTML, otherwise, it is considered plain text.
When unspecified and / is true, a tooltip is automatically generated according to the value of .

c:property.name: tooltipAutoContent
c:property.c:documentation: Indicates the type of automatic content generated for the tooltip of axis' labels.

c:complexType.name: FlattenedDiscreteCartesianAxis
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The options documentation class of the cartesian axis panel for flattened and discrete scale type.
For additional information, please see .

c:property.name: extensionPoints
c:property.c:documentation: The extension points object contains style definitions for the marks of the panel.

c:complexType.name: FlattenedDiscreteCartesianAxisExtensionPoints
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The extension points of the cartesian axis panel for flattened and discrete scale type.
Axes extension points can also be specified directly at the chart options level.
To use an extension point you must find its full name, by joining:
panel property name (ex: xAxis)
extension property (ex: ticks)
the "_" character
extension sub-property (ex: lineWidth)
and obtaining, for the examples, the camel-cased name: xAxisTicks_lineWidth (see ).

c:complexType.name: AnyDiscreteCartesianAxis
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The options documentation class of the cartesian axis panel for any discrete scale type.
For additional information, please see .

c:property.name: composite
c:property.c:documentation:
Indicates if the axis should show discrete multi-dimensional data in a hierarchical form, when true, or a flattened form, when false (applies to discrete axes).
Flattened axes, present multi-dimensional roles by joining the multiple values' labels with the separator character: .

c:property.name: extensionPoints
c:property.c:documentation: The extension points object contains style definitions for the marks of the panel.

extension sub-property (ex: lineWidth)

c:facetType.name: DiscreteCartesianAxisFacet
c:facetType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the cartesian axis panel for discrete scale types.

c:property.name: clickAction
c:property.c:documentation: A callback function that is called when the user clicks on a tick label (applies to discrete axes).

c:property.name: doubleClickAction
c:property.c:documentation: A callback function that is called when the user double-clicks on a tick label (applies to discrete axes).
